Steming: hi everyone im angelina novianti winarlie an information systems student from bina nusantara university want to share one of my recent studying experiences from agustus december became part of kampus merdeka independent student for cloud fundamental track with maribelajar and microsoft this program is one very wonderful alam for me it led me to gain many new experiences and knowledge about cloud computing with microsoft cloud azure learned and took exams in azure fundamentals power platform fundamental security compliance and identity fundamentals and azure administrator associate through selfpaced studying with microsoft learn and online synchronous asynchronous classes with the class mentor and assistant mentor furthermore managed to make one capstone project at the end of this program it helps me get fundamental knowledge about azure and helps me prepare for my future career at first it was not easy for me to adjust to this program since this was the first time was introduced to cloud computing were new challenges that needed to face for this new knowledge learn that are still many things that still know about information technology to learn about azure cloud computing as one of the most demanded technologies these days is such an incredible opportunity that can alam this year amazingly this program opens competitive opportunities with international colleagues by providing microsoft international certifications lastly want to say that feel really honored to able to become one of the students of this remarkable program thank you to mentor mr paulus insap santosa assistant mentor muhammad revin arnan and all the participants for guiding and helping me through this whole program hope we can achieve all of our dreams hope to meet you teman again

Steming: when it comes to it are many topics to talk about as someone whos always interested in learning new things was confused about what wanted to be in the future programmer designers sistem administrators are many choices that feel like have no purpose in life until one day my friend told me that he had made an application but was confused about how to make the application he made accessible to others he had thought about deploying his application to the cloud but he didnt understand how to it then thought since lot of people want to be programmers and make things what if become the person who supports their work by becoming cloud administrator thats since august have participated in certified independent studi program organized by microsoft indonesia with the topic of learning cloud fundamentals in this course learned lot about microsoft azure as cloud computing platform that can be used for various things from deploying web applications to training machine learning models apart from taking classes was also required to design and build cloud solution to problem that had nyata handson alam in this program can also take international certification from microsoft maximum of times which with these certificates can get more kerja opportunities when it comes to it its not just about programming theres lot to learn and think cloud computing will be highly soughtafter mampu in the future joining the microsoft indonesia independent studi program made me sedia to face that future and also recommend you to gabung it tags
